meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of this Regulation, an application for registration is an application under section 39(1) of the Ordinance for registration as—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a registered skilled worker for one designated trade division;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a registered skilled worker (provisional) for one designated trade division;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: a registered semi-skilled worker for one designated trade division;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: a registered semi-skilled worker (provisional) for one designated trade division; or

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: a registered general worker.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of this Regulation, an application for renewal of registration is an application under section 44(5) of the Ordinance for renewal of registration as—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a registered skilled worker for one designated trade division;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a registered semi-skilled worker for one designated trade division; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: a registered general worker.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Application fees for registration: general
section.content: Subject to sections 3A, 4 and 5, the fee payable for an application for registration is $100.

section.name: s3A
section.heading: Application fees for registration: registration periods of not more than 48 months

subsection.content: The fee payable for an application for registration for a registration period specified in column 1 of Schedule 1 is the percentage of the general application fee specified in column 2 of that Schedule opposite the period.

subsection.def: general application fee (一般申請費) means the fee prescribed by section 3;

registration period (註冊期), in relation to a registration, means the period beginning on the date of the registration and expiring on the date specified under section 44(1) of the Ordinance for the registration.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Application fees for registration: applicant is a registered construction worker
section.content: No fee is payable for an application for registration if the person making the application is already a registered construction worker.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Application fees for registration: specific designated trade divisions
section.leadIn: The fee payable for an application for registration is one-half of the fee prescribed under section 3 or 3A if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: it is an application for registration as a registered skilled worker or registered semi-skilled worker for a designated trade division; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a qualification or requirement is set out in column 6 of Schedule 1 to the Ordinance opposite the trade division.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Application fees for renewal of registration: general
section.content: Subject to sections 6A and 6B, the fee payable for an application for renewal of registration is $100.

section.name: s6A
section.heading: Application fees for renewal of registration: renewal periods of not more than 48 months

subsection.content: The fee payable for an application for renewal of registration for a renewal period specified in column 1 of Schedule 2 is the percentage of the general renewal fee specified in column 2 of that Schedule opposite the period.

subsection.def: general renewal fee (一般續期費) means the fee prescribed by section 6;

def.name: RenewalPeriod
def.leadIn: renewal period (續期期間), in relation to the renewal of a registration, means the period—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: beginning on the relevant date as defined by paragraph (b), (c) or (d) of the definition of relevant date in section 44(10) of the Ordinance; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: expiring on the date specified under section 44(1) of the Ordinance for the registration as renewed.

section.name: s6B
section.heading: Application fees for renewal of registration: specific designated trade divisions
section.leadIn: The fee payable for an application for renewal of registration is one-half of the fee prescribed under section 6 or 6A if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: it is an application for renewal of registration as a registered skilled worker or registered semi-skilled worker for a designated trade division; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a qualification or requirement is set out in column 6 of Schedule 1 to the Ordinance opposite the trade division.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Application fees: replacement of registration card
section.content: The fee payable in respect of an application under section 46(8) or (9) of the Ordinance is $100.

section.name: s8
section.heading: Fees for the purpose of a notice of appeal
section.content: The fee payable in respect of a notice of appeal for the purposes of section 52(4)(b) of the Ordinance is $30.

section.name: s8A
section.heading: Fee for assessment under section 40A(8) of Ordinance

subsection.content: The fee payable under section 40A(8) of the Ordinance for one assessment referred to in section 40A(1)(b)(ii) of the Ordinance is $50.

subsection.leadIn: The Council is to refund in full a fee paid under subsection (1) in connection with a person’s application for registration if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the application is made within 12 months beginning on the commencement date* of section 40A of the Ordinance; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the person passes the assessment for which the fee was paid.

section.name: s9
section.heading: Waiver of application fees for registration

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person makes 2 or more applications for registration at the same time; and (L.N. 205 of 2005)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a fee is prescribed for each application under section 3, 3A or 5. (L.N. 15 of 2015)

subsection.leadIn: The fee payable in respect of each application, other than the following, is waived—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in the case where the fee so prescribed for each application is of the same amount, the fee payable in respect of any one application specified by the Registrar;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: in the case where the fee so prescribed for each application is not of the same amount— (L.N. 205 of 2005)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the fee payable in respect of the application for which the fee so prescribed is of the lower or lowest amount; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: if there are 2 or more such applications, the fee payable in respect of any one of such applications specified by the Registrar.

section.name: s10
section.heading: Waiver of application fees for renewal of registration

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a person makes 2 or more applications for renewal of his registration at the same time; and (L.N. 205 of 2005)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: a fee is prescribed for each application under section 6, 6A or 6B. (L.N. 15 of 2015)

subsection.leadIn: The fee payable in respect of each application, other than the following, is waived—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: in the case where the fee so prescribed for each application is of the same amount, the fee payable in respect of any one application specified by the Registrar;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: in the case where the fee so prescribed for each application is not of the same amount— (L.N. 205 of 2005)

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the fee payable in respect of the application for which the fee so prescribed is of the lower or lowest amount; or

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: if there are 2 or more such applications, the fee payable in respect of any one of such applications specified by the Registrar.

schedule.name: sch1
schedule.heading: Application Fees for Registration for Registration Periods of Not More Than 48 Months

td.p: More than 12 months but not more than 24 months
More than 24 months but not more than 36 months
More than 36 months but not more than 48 months

schedule.name: sch2
schedule.heading: Application Fees for Renewal of Registration for Renewal Periods of Not More Than 48 Months

td.p: More than 12 months but not more than 24 months
More than 24 months but not more than 36 months
More than 36 months but not more than 48 months
